name: Scarlet Witch
text: Chaos Control — Interrupt: When boost icons on an encounter card would be counted, discard the top card of the encounter deck and count the number of boost icons on that card instead. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Wanda Maximoff
text: Superpowered Siblings — Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand → draw 2 cards (draw 3 cards instead if Pietro Maximoff is in play). (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "I've warned you never to threaten my sister!"
name: Quicksilver
text: Action: Ready Quicksilver. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "I will shape the world as I see fit." - Scarlet Witch
name: Chaos Magic
text: Hero Action: Play a card from your hand, ignoring its resource cost. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck equal to that card's printed resource cost.

name: Hex Bolt
text: Hero Action: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each card discarded this way that has boost icons equal to: - 0, deal 2 damage to an enemy. - 1, remove 2 threat from a scheme. - 2, draw 1 card. - 3+, place a status card on a character.

flavor: "There is no defense against the Scarlet Witch!"
name: Molecular Decay
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy and discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. For each boost icon discarded this way, deal 1 additional damage to that enemy.

name: Warp Reality
text: Hero Interrupt: When an encounter card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel all of its effects and discard it. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

flavor: "Don't let your anger get the best of you, Wanda."
name: Agatha Harkness
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Agatha Harkness → look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those to your hand and place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Magic Shield
text: Hero Interrupt: When a friendly character would take any amount of damage, discard Magic Shield → prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Scarlet Witch's Crest
text: Interrupt: When boost icons on an encounter card are counted, exhaust Scarlet Witch's Crest → increase or decrease the number of boost icons on that card by 1 for this count.

flavor: "Hey! Geriatrics! Let's get a move on. The Avengers need us!"
name: Speed
text: Response: After Speed thwarts, ready him. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "I'm the child of a witch and an android. I'm their wish come true."
name: Wiccan
text: Response: After Wiccan thwarts, discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon discarded this way, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Crisis Averted
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 6 threat from the main scheme. If you paid for this card using a [mental] resource, this thwart ignores the crisis icon ([crisis]).

flavor: "A hero isn't the one who always wins. They're the one who always tries." - Spider-Man
name: Multitasking
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using a [mental] resource, remove 2 threat from a different scheme.

flavor: "Return what you've taken and I'll let you go. This time. But next time, you won't be so lucky. And I won't be so kind." - Moon Knight
name: Swift Retribution
text: Hero Action (attack): The villain schemes. Deal 4 damage to the villain.

name: Turn the Tide
text: Response (attack): After your hero thwarts and removes all threat from a scheme, deal 3 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Every spell, every sigil, every manipulation... you must keep a close eye on everything so it doesn't backfire."
name: Spiritual Meditation
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Mystic]] trait. Action: Draw 2 cards. Choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Browbeat
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait. Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to the villain. Deal X additional damage to the villain (to a maximum of 3), where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

flavor: "Heed, great fiend! Thou shalt not defeat me easily!" - Lady Sif
name: Last Stand
text: Hero Interrupt: When an ally you control attacks, it gets +3 ATK for that attack. After that attack resolves, discard that ally.

flavor: "You didn't really think I'd let you get away with that, did you?" - Spider-Man
name: Bait and Switch
text: Hero Action (thwart): The villain attacks you. Remove 4 threat from the main scheme.

flavor: "You look to be feeling better." - Stephen Strange
name: Recuperation
text: Alter-Ego Action: Heal damage from your alter-ego equal to your REC.
